description: Retrieves the usages (most recent data) for the given database.

resource_group_name.description: Name of an Azure resource group.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2015-04-08.

filter.description: An OData filter expression that describes a subset of usages to return. The supported parameter is name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names).

value.description: The list of usages for the database. A usage is a point in time metric
